Afghans were a type of knitwear found in the town of Dragon Falls in the Vast.
In the , a group of goodly adventurers from the Living City, Ravens Bluff, visited the village of Dragon Falls on a quest to secure an evil artifact, a Book of Vile Darkness. While searching for any lore and history on the areas around the town, especially Keldar of the Forest and Keldars Shrine, adventurers visited an old cranky but knowledgeable crone. Kala wore a warm knitted afghan during the meeting. She refused to take the throw off, whilst demanding the guests to fan her.
